Configuration complete:
  • embedded db
  • http only
  • ...
    • Use these settings next boot

• database servers

    available

    • boot (localhost:9876/aquameta) (online, aquameta not installed, default)
    • Postgres.app Server (localhost:5432/aquameta) (online, aquameta installed)

    actions

    • install instructions (select platform (OSX, Windows, Debian). select packager (brew, Postgres.app, binary)
    • connect (enter manual PostgreSQL connections settings)

  • http servers

    • bootloader (this) (online, private, autostart, localhost:8888, database aquameta)
    • shared (online, public, no autostart, localhost:8080, database aquameta)

  • peers

    P2P connections to other users
    • jim (connecte, 8 subscriptions)
    • marge (offline)
    • barry (connected)

    current connections

    • home localhost:9876/aquameta(online)

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
    <head>

        <title>Aquameta</title>
        <script src='/system.js'></script>
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/semantic-ui@2.4.2/dist/semantic.min.css">        
        <meta http-equiv="Content-type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8">
        <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width">
    </head>
    <body></body>
    <script>
        System.import('/widget.js').then(function(widget) {
            System.import('/semantic.min.js').then(function(s) {

                var db = new AQ.Database('/endpoint/0.2', { evented: 'no' });
                window.endpoint = db;

                AQ.Widget.import('org.aquameta.core.bootloader', 'bl', db);
                AQ.Widget.import('org.aquameta.core.ide', 'ide', db);
                AQ.Widget.import('org.aquameta.ui.p2p', 'p2p', db);
                AQ.Widget.import('org.aquameta.ui.auth', 'auth', db);
                AQ.Widget.import('org.aquameta.ui.layout', 'layout', db);
                AQ.Widget.import('org.aquameta.ui.tags', 'tag', db);

                $('body').append(widget('bl:base', {
                    content: widget('bl:setup')
                }));
                $('body').append(widget('ide:debugger3_manager'));

            });
        });
    </script>
</html>
